resources.string: 30 Days of Basketball Training
Day1: Dribbling Basics - Practice dribbling with both hands, focus on low and controlled dribbles.
Day2: Shooting Fundamentals - Work on your shooting form; start close to the basket and gradually move back.
Day3: Passing Drills - Practice chest passes, bounce passes, and overhead passes with a partner or against a wall.
Day4: Defensive Stance - Work on maintaining a low and balanced defensive stance.
Day5: Layups - Practice both right-hand and left-hand layups from different angles.
Day6: Footwork - Work on pivoting, jump stops, and quick movements without traveling.
Day7: Free Throws - Spend the day perfecting your free-throw shooting technique.
Day8: Agility Drills - Ladder drills and cone drills to improve quickness and agility.
Day9: Rebounding - Practice boxing out and timing your jumps to grab rebounds.
Day10: Ball Handling - Advanced dribbling moves like crossovers, behind-the-back, and spin moves.
Day11: Shooting Off the Dribble - Work on shooting after dribbling; focus on balance and quick release.
Day12: Conditioning - Sprints, shuttle runs, and endurance drills to build stamina
Day13: Defensive Drills - Practice closeouts, shot contests, and defensive slides
Day14: Mid-Range Shooting - Focus on jump shots from mid-range areas.
Day15: Three-Point Shooting - Move to the three-point line and practice shooting from different spots.
Day16: Passing Under Pressure - Practice making accurate passes while being closely guarded.
Day17: Offensive Moves - Work on driving to the basket, spin moves, and step-backs.
Day18: Court Awareness - Play some 1-on-1 or 3-on-3 games to enhance your court vision.
Day19: Weak Hand - Dedicate the day to improving your non-dominant hand skills.
Day20: Shooting Consistency - Focus on maintaining consistent form and release on your shots.
Day21: Defensive Awareness - Work on reading the offense and anticipating their moves.
Day22: Pick-and-Roll - Practice setting screens and running the pick-and-roll effectively.
Day23: Fast Break - Work on pushing the ball quickly up the court and finishing at the rim.
Day24: Off-Ball Movement - Practice moving without the ball and creating scoring opportunities.
Day25: Shooting Under Pressure - Simulate game scenarios and practice shooting with defenders.
Day26: Post Moves - Work on scoring moves in the post like hooks, drop steps, and up-and-under.
Day27: Play making - Focus on creating scoring opportunities for your teammates.
Day28: Defensive Intensity - High-energy defensive drills and full-court press practice.
Day29: Game Simulation - Play a full game to incorporate all the skills youâ€™ve worked on.
Day30: Review and Reflect - Evaluate your progress, identify areas for improvement, and set new goals.
